short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upload files to ChatGPT without paying for Plus

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to upload files to ChatGPT without paying for the Plus membership

You can add a prompt to the upload to let ChatGPT know what it should do with the file contents, for example, ' change all ".btn" classes to ".old_btn" '
The default prompt is "Describe the file contents"

This extension is inspired by the "Automate My Life" Youtube video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iR99LO28nzM

Help me not starve and buy me some ramen: 
https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=HRV9YFCXDEHDE

Thank you for using my extension!
